select.if: select count(*) as totRecCnt from itGame;

if.if: select count(*) as totRecCnt from itGame where gameTitle like concat('%',#{search},'%') or gameSubTitle like concat('%',#{search},'%');
select count(*) as totRecCnt from itGame where developer like concat('%',#{search},'%');

select.if: select * from itGame order by ${viewpart} limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};

if.if: select * from itGame where gameTitle like concat('%',#{search},'%') or gameSubTitle like concat('%',#{search},'%') order by ${viewpart} limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select * from itGame where developer like concat('%',#{search},'%') order by ${viewpart} limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};

select.if: select count(*) as totRecCnt from itMember;

if.if: select count(*) as totRecCnt from itMember where mid like concat('%',#{search},'%');
select count(*) as totRecCnt from itMember where nickname like concat('%',#{search},'%');

select.if: select m.*, b.banDay from itMember m LEFT JOIN itBan b ON m.mid=b.banMid order by idx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};

if.if: select m.*, b.banDay from itMember m LEFT JOIN itBan b ON m.mid=b.banMid where m.mid like concat('%',#{search},'%') order by idx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select m.*, b.banDay from itMember m LEFT JOIN itBan b ON m.mid=b.banMid where m.nickname like concat('%',#{search},'%') order by idx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};

select.if: select count(*) as totRecCnt from itMember where level=#{viewpart};

if.if: select count(*) as totRecCnt from itMember where mid like concat('%',#{search},'%') and level=#{viewpart};
select count(*) as totRecCnt from itMember where nickname like concat('%',#{search},'%') and level=#{viewpart};

select.if: select m.*, b.banDay from itMember m LEFT JOIN itBan b ON m.mid=b.banMid where m.level=#{viewpart} order by idx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};

if.if: select m.*, b.banDay from itMember m LEFT JOIN itBan b ON m.mid=b.banMid where m.mid like concat('%',#{search},'%') and m.level=#{viewpart} order by idx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select m.*, b.banDay from itMember m LEFT JOIN itBan b ON m.mid=b.banMid where m.nickname like concat('%',#{search},'%') and m.level=#{viewpart} order by idx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};

select.if: select count(*) as totRecCnt from itMember where loginState=#{viewpart};

select count(*) as totRecCnt from itMember where nickname like concat('%',#{search},'%') and loginState=#{viewpart};

select.if: select m.*, b.banDay from itMember m LEFT JOIN itBan b ON m.mid=b.banMid where m.loginState=#{viewpart} order by idx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};

if.if: select m.*, b.banDay from itMember m LEFT JOIN itBan b ON m.mid=b.banMid where m.mid like concat('%',#{search},'%') and m.loginState=#{viewpart} order by idx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};

select m.*, b.banDay from itMember m LEFT JOIN itBan b ON m.mid=b.banMid where m.nickname like concat('%',#{search},'%') and m.loginState=#{viewpart} order by idx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select count(*) as totRecCnt from itMember where pwd = 'kakaoMember';
select count(*) as totRecCnt from itMember where mid like concat('%',#{search},'%') and pwd = 'kakaoMember';
select count(*) as totRecCnt from itMember where nickname like concat('%',#{search},'%') and pwd = 'kakaoMember';
select count(*) as totRecCnt from itMember where pwd != 'kakaoMember';
select count(*) as totRecCnt from itMember where mid like concat('%',#{search},'%') and pwd != 'kakaoMember';
select count(*) as totRecCnt from itMember where nickname like concat('%',#{search},'%') and pwd != 'kakaoMember';
select m.*, b.banDay from itMember m LEFT JOIN itBan b ON m.mid=b.banMid where m.pwd = 'kakaoMember' order by idx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select m.*, b.banDay from itMember m LEFT JOIN itBan b ON m.mid=b.banMid where m.mid like concat('%',#{search},'%') and m.pwd = 'kakaoMember' order by idx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select m.*, b.banDay from itMember m LEFT JOIN itBan b ON m.mid=b.banMid where m.nickname like concat('%',#{search},'%') and m.pwd = 'kakaoMember' order by idx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select m.*, b.banDay from itMember m LEFT JOIN itBan b ON m.mid=b.banMid where m.pwd != 'kakaoMember' order by idx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select m.*, b.banDay from itMember m LEFT JOIN itBan b ON m.mid=b.banMid where m.mid like concat('%',#{search},'%') and m.pwd != 'kakaoMember' order by idx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};

select m.*, b.banDay from itMember m LEFT JOIN itBan b ON m.mid=b.banMid where m.nickname like concat('%',#{search},'%') and m.pwd != 'kakaoMember' order by idx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};

select count(*) from itReport where complete=0 and reportMid like concat('%',#{search},'%');
select count(*) from itReport where complete=0 and sufferMid like concat('%',#{search},'%');

select count(*) from itReport where complete=1 and reportMid like concat('%',#{search},'%');

select count(*) from itReport where complete=2 and sufferMid like concat('%',#{search},'%');
select count(*) from itReport;
select count(*) from itReport where reportMid like concat('%',#{search},'%');
select count(*) from itReport where sufferMid like concat('%',#{search},'%');
select * from itReport where complete=0 order by reIdx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select * from itReport where complete=0 and reportMid like concat('%',#{search},'%') order by reIdx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select * from itReport where complete=0 and sufferMid like concat('%',#{search},'%') order by reIdx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};

select * from itReport where complete=1 and sufferMid like concat('%',#{search},'%') order by reIdx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};

select * from itReport where complete=2 and reportMid like concat('%',#{search},'%') order by reIdx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select * from itReport where complete=2 and sufferMid like concat('%',#{search},'%') order by reIdx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};

select * from itReport where sufferMid like concat('%',#{search},'%') order by ${viewpart} limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select count(*) from itSupport where supComplete=0;
select count(*) from itSupport where supComplete=0 and supEmail like concat('%',#{search},'%');
select count(*) from itSupport where supComplete=1;
select count(*) from itSupport where supComplete=1 and supEmail like concat('%',#{search},'%');
select count(*) from itSupport;
select count(*) from itSupport where supEmail like concat('%',#{search},'%');
select * from itSupport where supComplete=0 order by supIdx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select * from itSupport where supComplete=0 and supEmail like concat('%',#{search},'%') order by supIdx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select * from itSupport where supComplete=1 order by supIdx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select * from itSupport where supComplete=1 and supEmail like concat('%',#{search},'%') order by supIdx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select * from itSupport order by ${viewpart} limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select * from itSupport where supEmail like concat('%',#{search},'%') order by ${viewpart} limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select count(*) from itGameRequest where grComplete=0;
select count(*) from itGameRequest where grComplete=0 and gameTitle like concat('%',#{search},'%');
select count(*) from itGameRequest where grComplete=0 and reqMid like concat('%',#{search},'%');
select count(*) from itGameRequest where grComplete=1;
select count(*) from itGameRequest where grComplete=1 and gameTitle like concat('%',#{search},'%');
select count(*) from itGameRequest where grComplete=1 and reqMid like concat('%',#{search},'%');
select count(*) from itGameRequest where grComplete=2;
select count(*) from itGameRequest where grComplete=2 and gameTitle like concat('%',#{search},'%');
select count(*) from itGameRequest where grComplete=2 and reqMid like concat('%',#{search},'%');
select count(*) from itGameRequest;
select count(*) from itGameRequest where gameTitle like concat('%',#{search},'%');
select count(*) from itGameRequest where reqMid like concat('%',#{search},'%');
select * from itGameRequest where grComplete=0 order by grIdx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select * from itGameRequest where grComplete=0 and gameTitle like concat('%',#{search},'%') order by grIdx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select * from itGameRequest where grComplete=0 and reqMid like concat('%',#{search},'%') order by grIdx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select * from itGameRequest where grComplete=1 order by grIdx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select * from itGameRequest where grComplete=1 and gameTitle like concat('%',#{search},'%') order by grIdx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select * from itGameRequest where grComplete=1 and reqMid like concat('%',#{search},'%') order by grIdx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select * from itGameRequest where grComplete=2 order by select * from itGameRequest where grComplete=1 order by grIdx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize}; desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select * from itGameRequest where grComplete=2 and gameTitle like concat('%',#{search},'%') order by grIdx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select * from itGameRequest where grComplete=2 and reqMid like concat('%',#{search},'%') order by grIdx desc limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select * from itGameRequest order by ${viewpart} limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select * from itGameRequest where gameTitle like concat('%',#{search},'%') order by ${viewpart} limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};
select * from itGameRequest where reqMid like concat('%',#{search},'%') order by ${viewpart} limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};

mapper.insert: insert into itGame values(default, #{vo.gameTitle}, #{vo.gameSubTitle}, #{vo.jangre}, #{vo.platform}, default,#{vo.showDate},#{vo.price}, default, #{vo.metascore}, #{vo.steamscore}, #{vo.steamPage}, #{vo.developer}, #{vo.gameImg}, #{vo.gameInfo});
insert into itBan values(#{banMid}, default, default, #{reason});

update.if: update itGame set gameSubTitle=#{vo.gameSubTitle}, jangre=#{vo.jangre}, platform=#{vo.platform},showDate=default,#{vo.showDate},price=#{vo.price}, metascore=#{vo.metascore}, steamscore=#{vo.steamscore}, steamPage=#{vo.steamPage}, developer=#{vo.developer}, gameInfo=#{vo.gameInfo} where gameIdx=#{vo.gameIdx};

update itGame set gameSubTitle=#{vo.gameSubTitle}, jangre=#{vo.jangre}, platform=#{vo.platform},showDate=default,#{vo.showDate},price=#{vo.price}, metascore=#{vo.metascore}, steamscore=#{vo.steamscore}, steamPage=#{vo.steamPage}, developer=#{vo.developer}, gameImg=#{vo.gameImg}, gameInfo=#{vo.gameInfo} where gameIdx=#{vo.gameIdx};

update itGame set gameTitle=#{vo.gameTitle}, gameSubTitle=#{vo.gameSubTitle}, jangre=#{vo.jangre}, platform=#{vo.platform},showDate=default,#{vo.showDate},price=#{vo.price}, metascore=#{vo.metascore}, steamscore=#{vo.steamscore}, steamPage=#{vo.steamPage}, developer=#{vo.developer}, gameInfo=#{vo.gameInfo} where gameIdx=#{vo.gameIdx};

update itGame set gameTitle=#{vo.gameTitle}, gameSubTitle=#{vo.gameSubTitle}, jangre=#{vo.jangre}, platform=#{vo.platform},showDate=default,#{vo.showDate},price=#{vo.price}, metascore=#{vo.metascore}, steamscore=#{vo.steamscore}, steamPage=#{vo.steamPage}, developer=#{vo.developer}, gameImg=#{vo.gameImg}, gameInfo=#{vo.gameInfo} where gameIdx=#{vo.gameIdx};

mapper.update: update itMember set level=#{level}, nickname=#{nickname}, title=#{title} where idx=#{idx};
update itBan set banDay=#{day}, banTime=now(), banReason=#{reason} where banMid=#{banMid};
update itMember set loginState='NO' where mid=#{banMid};
update itMember set loginState='BAN' where mid=#{banMid};
update itMember set loginState='OK' where mid=#{banMid};
update itReport set complete=1 where reIdx=#{reIdx};
update itReport set complete=2 where reIdx=#{reIdx};
update itSupport set supComplete=1 where supIdx=#{supIdx};
update itGameRequest set grComplete=1 where grIdx=#{grIdx};
update itGameRequest set grComplete=2, reason=#{reason} where grIdx=#{grIdx};
